column4: when they feel like packaging it, there is a third party repo that has beta6

to install gaim 6, do this, copy and paste it all at once: echo "deb  http://repository.debuntu.org/ edgy multiverse" | sudo tee -a /etc/apt/sources.list && wget http://repository.debuntu.org/GPG-Key-chantra.txt && sudo apt-key add GPG-Key-chantra.txt && rm GPG-Key-chantra.txt && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get upgrade
it tells me "2 not upgraded" at the end
ok do sudo apt-get install gaim
did that gaim thing work
Yes it did.  Thanks for the help.  Sorry I didn't confirm it before, I started to read stuff and got a little lost in it.
ok good
Cool, thanks
linux is the general name of all the distros based on the linux kernel, ubuntu is based on debian, gnome is a desktop environment that can be run on any distro including ubuntu
So roughly it's Linux -> Debian -> Ubuntu which can branch out to Gnome or KDE (with kubuntu)?
yeah, and gnome and kde can go on debian too
OK, sorry for the dumb questions, I'm just hoping to understand it better.
no problem
if you do /msg ubotu firewall (or any other thing) it will tell you in pm
Do you recommend Firestarter to config the firewall?
yeah
It's not in synaptic, how do I get it?
do "sudo sed 's/# deb/deb/g' -i /etc/apt/sources.list && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install firestarter" make sure you close synaptic before doing that
Thanks it's installing
Once it completes, where does it put it?
it will be in the menus, it might be in system>administration
